flawed_nl_solution:
If Emani has $150, Howard has $150 - $30 = $<<150-30=210>>210
In total, they have $210 + $150 = $<<210+150=360>>360
When they share this money equally, each gets $360 / 2 people = $<<360/2=180>>180/person

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 120, not 210. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
